main-page.header-subtitle:
Software developer with a focus on frontend and backend development as well as
practical experience in setting up and operating own server infrastructures.
main-page.about-me-p1: I have been fascinated by IT and software development for many years. During my training, I work on both frontend and backend applications. I am particularly interested in the interaction of software, infrastructure, and stable systems, which allows complex solutions to be implemented in a practical way.
main-page.about-me-p2: In addition to my training, I implement my own projects - from web applications and bots to the setup and operation of my own server infrastructures. In my home lab, I plan, operate, and automate server services, including my own VPN solutions, Docker setups, and game servers. These projects help me apply and deepen theoretical knowledge in practice.
main-page.about-me-p3: I work in a structured and independent manner and value clean, maintainable code. Teamwork and exchanging technical solutions are natural to me. For my professional future, I am looking for a permanent position where I can further develop professionally and actively contribute to the implementation of modern software solutions.
